title: Zimbabwe To Continue Mineral Purchases in 2026, Central Bank Governor Says
description: Zimbabwe will continue to make strategic mineral purchases in 2026 in order to build its foreign currency reserves, as it pushes ahead with plans to adopt the ZiG as its sole currency by 2030, central bank governor John Mushayavanhu said on Sunday.
